name: Energy intensity of transportation sector (MJ/2011 USD PPP)
name_cn: 运输业单位产值能耗（2011年美元）

name: Energy intensity of service sector (MJ/2011 USD PPP)
name_cn: 服务业单位产值能耗（2011年美元）

name: Energy intensity of agricultural sector (MJ/$2005)
name_cn: 农业部门单位产值能耗（2005年美元）
source_note: Energy intensity of agricultural sector (MJ/$2005): A ratio between energy consumption in agricultural sector (including forestry and fishing) and agricultural sector value added measured at purchasing power parity. Energy intensity is an indication of how much energy is used to produce one unit of economic output. Lower ratio indicates that less energy is used to produce one unit of output.
source_organization: World Bank and International Energy Agency (IEA Statistics © OECD/IEA, http://www.iea.org/stats/index.asp).
